Name: Return the Backrooms
About the game: Return the Backrooms is a co-op horror game with support for up to 4 players, where you and your friends have to find a way out, very complex and confusing corridors that will drive you crazy, and even more so filled with various creatures. this game contains elements of legendary creepypasta. You will be forced to explore all the rooms and the maze itself to find the necessary items to unlock new locations and pass the game, some things like the first aid kit will help you in times of trouble, but you can't carry a lot of them. Online Co-Op Support for up to 4 players at the same time Confusing game map The game's map is designed in such a way that you wander around a lot to make it seem like you know where you're going, when in fact you don't, you're just wandering around in circles. Entities In the game, you can meet several types of entities and ordinary creatures. Rooms both simple rooms to wander and find items, and unique ones where you have to complete a mini-puzzle Lockers in them, you can hide from enemies, and in some of them you can find items Difficulty which affects most aspects of gameplay Experience and level for each successful or unsuccessful game, you will gain experience and increase your game level, starting with some levels you will unlock new levels of difficulty. Chat For communication and system messages. Piece of soul is a key item to get out of the backrooms, it attracts its owner and other entities Chalk For drawing on the ground for better orientation. Own and other people's arrows are of different colors Medkit It will help in difficult cases when you or your teammate are injured. Flashlight Useful in the dark when there is no other light.
